casebody.data:
LOTHIAN CASSIDY, L.L.C., et al., petitioners,
v.
LOTHIAN EXPLORATION & DEVELOPMENT II, L.P., LEAD II, et al. Shoshana Trust, et al., petitioners,
v.
Michael Raleigh, et al. No. 18-148. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 9, 2018.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
